website_summaries.verdict: A fryer that can please the crowds and your budget.
pros: While this fryer may require some configuration with your power source, it fries quickly and with tasty results
Even more attractive to some is the fryer's price point
Fry everyone's favorites for large groups
cons: Built with thin material that may not hold up well over time and extensive use

customer_reviews.title: Works great but baskets handles are junk I had to rebend ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but baskets handles are junk I had to rebend one to get it to stay in and the plastic fell off both baskets so I had to ducted tape them right in the middle of a busy fair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT commercial! It is cheap made, the baskets are weak and your better off getting the ones from Walmart. Very dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: shalane Ayala

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: It is a good value. Nicely priced and works well. The cons are with sharp edges. Must wear protective gloves or risk getting cut from the edges. Cleaning would be much easier if the edges were not so sharp. Again must handle with care. Removal of the plate covering the coil is delicate. Must squeeze the coils to slide the plate thru. No instructions are included for setup. Overall we are happy with it but gave satisfactory rating due to the instructions, assembly and sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Nillinator

customer_reviews.title: Worked great the first time
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time. It did trip one breaker but found another outlet that worked without tripping. After one use one of the heating elements went out. Company shipped out a new element right away but it was incorrect part. After the hassle decided to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works out awesome, when you have a lot to cook and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works out awesome, when you have a lot to cook and a very large group of people,,which is something we have a lot of going on......
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Stopped working After using only three times. Grease was leaking from the bottom. $100 wasted!!
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Seabury

customer_reviews.title: not quite as good as a true commercial deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: Performs very well, not quite as good as a true commercial deep fryer, but definetly far superior to anything you would get for your home from a chain store. It has a little trouble keeping up if your doing alot of frozen food like french fries. Over all i am very satisfied with this deep fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Comnick

customer_reviews.title: Need some look at!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I need to change that remark... soon as I turned it on it blow out I opened the back and there is rusted bolts and burned wires....!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had almost a year and it cooks great but it runs off a lot of volts if i plug in same plug it cuts my power so i have to split it up
customer_reviews.author: aresha scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husbands birthday gift & he LOVES it. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Plaster

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise does a fantastic job of deep frying and holds temps really well
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot bigger than I expected it to be buy I am enjoying it very much. Only thing is you have to have a 20 amp circuit by itself to run both sides at the same time. And if anything else is on that circuit it will trip it. Otherwise does a fantastic job of deep frying and holds temps really well.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis L. Brower

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this frier. A little bigger than I thought it looked online. But it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Fryer
customer_reviews.text: My Husband LOVES IT!This is a good fryer. Use it for our house for gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mocha

customer_reviews.title: This is it
customer_reviews.text: Fresh fries, chips, and wings it just don't get better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning takes some time , longer than usually, gets gummy on the sides and top after 7 uses. not easy to empty out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ealy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it makes great fries and fish and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Woods SR.

customer_reviews.title: after that we love it!
customer_reviews.text: takes a few times to get used to it, after that we love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My double fryer ❤❤
customer_reviews.text: Great product and performance but had to use separate outlets (not on same circuit) this kept popping the circuit breaker
customer_reviews.author: ERIC L . JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE A SMALL STORE AND THIS FRYER WORKS GREAT! Well.. update. One of them only lasted 5 months. I do not know how to fix it or what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie parker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only one side works and the other not so hot
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: for the price it's a great frier. We keep in on 8 hrs a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a high quality unit however, for the price it's a great frier. We keep in on 8 hrs a day 7 days a week and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superman Fast and even heat!
customer_reviews.text: It heats fast, it actually does better than I expected. When I need another fryer I will always use Yescom! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sessions

customer_reviews.title: ... not attach the little feet and it didn't seem like it would stay
customer_reviews.text: Could not attach the little feet and it didn't seem like it would stay together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can fry any food.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I have used it 3 times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chem551

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than described and plenty enough space per volume to serve the customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after one week
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst purchase I made on amazon by far, don’t wast your money on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Elmallah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it only thing I needed was spout for the grease to drain out
customer_reviews.author: Niqelia

customer_reviews.title: High Volt Usage
customer_reviews.text: It does pull alot of power usage in the home setting but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Washington

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I simply love love it. All my friends and family were so amazed- they want to order one
customer_reviews.author: PenniPretti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's just what I needed it's very handy and portable for indoors and out thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought that for my Pastor and she love it for her catering business. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Cone

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deep fryer. Just larger than I thought (my fault)
customer_reviews.author: FRANK HELLVIG

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Fryer works great. No problems at all. Was delivered in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: W. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for frying large amounts of chicken for Easter dinner
customer_reviews.text: Great for frying large amounts of chicken for Easter dinner! The construction of fryer is not commercial use quality, but we don't intend using it as such and we couldn't find anything comparable in stores for large groups. We will get good use of it for our large family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other wise I really enjoy it heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: The handle doesn't stay on very well. I find the wherever the knobs it's very lose. Other wise I really enjoy it heats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Very good fryer...but it feels a little on the cheap side because of the constructionaterial is like cardstock thin. But non the less does its job.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I received the deep fryer in a time for a special event.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: very nice unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: very nice unit for the price. It's not built like a tank but it is light weight which was great for us, we used it to run a food stand at a festival. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great fryer
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed the fryer. glad I got the double tub. One for chicken/fries and the other one for fish/hushpuppies. well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it! However, the baskets were too small! I used another from another deep fryer!
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA EASON

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size, but it takes a long time to heat. Got to be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Emmylou

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had it over a year in September an the heating element is not working....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my yescom commercial12 5000w stainless steel fryer it got me a long way when cooking
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Product
customer_reviews.text: Donated this to the Women's Chapter at our local Moose Lodge for them to cook wings weekly. They love it and there is plenty of space to do several orders at once!
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The recovery time is low but its nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you buy it, get some insurance.
customer_reviews.text: In use for 4 months. The knob on one of the fryers is broke. Its not the plastic piece its inside the fryer.
customer_reviews.author: marcus

customer_reviews.title: loved this fryer you can cook a lot of food ...
customer_reviews.text: loved this fryer you can cook a lot of food at once. the only thing I would change is it need to have a full line marked in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this deep fryer. It perform better than any I have ever owned. I use to own a delicatessan and had 3 deep fryers I paid over $1400 and this one is just as good as they were if not better. This money very well spent
customer_reviews.author: JESSE C.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to clean with the removable pans and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do, however the recovering heat up time and cooking time is somewhat long. It is easy to clean with the removable pans and I like that it has covers for in-between uses. Ok product, decent price.
customer_reviews.author: the blonde chef

customer_reviews.title: despite that it's a good frier.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who was impressed with how well it worked. I unfortunately took on the task of cleaning it and found edges to be very sharp. So be cautious when cleaning or you may get cut, despite that it's a good frier.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Wright

customer_reviews.title: But love having the 2 sides
customer_reviews.text: We did have issues with one of the sides not turning off, so we always have to unplug it when we're through. But love having the 2 sides. We keep one for french fries only, and the other for meats. Just switched out to peanut oil for even better flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fish fry Friday’s. I requested to send it back because I used it twice and one side went out but I missed the return deadline trying to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Well built, for commercial use. Parts not rattling and shabby like those cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law gave a good report about this fryer. Never used it. From reports it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good Fryer
customer_reviews.text: As other have said, it wouldn’t work well in a restaurant, but it works great in a home kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The product is good just bad design on the baskets the handles do ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is good just bad design on the baskets the handles do not fit properly and could fall off
customer_reviews.author: Donna L smith

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the price. Not 5 stars because the heating coils are very thin. Do not know how durable it will be.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: didnt get above 370 deg. cant use then
customer_reviews.text: didnt get above 370 deg. cant use then, had to return. said would get to like what 390 or 400 deg
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Really GOOD the Basket is made VERY Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not Really GOOD the Basket is made VERY Cheap!!! It keep Snaping out with EVERY FRY! I'm look for something better!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have not had this fryer set up for long ...
customer_reviews.text: We have not had this fryer set up for long and it has a wire loose already :( if it gets wiggled it trips the breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. it has worked great the 4 times i have used it.
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND D JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife thinking this will a great addition to her deep fry collection. Well, it is a very nice item but I thought it came with a French Chip Scoop and cleaning pads but I was wrong so the seller says. You read the specs on this item is it me or is those items listed. Do tell. Just to be sure I read the description of this product and yes those items are listed. Why I was told by seller it doesn't come with the deep fryer again, do tell....
customer_reviews.author: Scorpn1

product_meta.title: Mega Brand Dual Basket Stainless Steel Electric Countertop Deep Fryer
product_meta.description:
Dimensions: 9" x 8" 
Right-handed use design 
Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Construction 
Plastic Handle for protect hands from heat 
Heavy Duty Stainless Steel for Commercial Applications 
Wattage: 5000W 
Power Supply: 110V/50Hz 
Temperature Control Switch: 60~200℃ 
Overall Dimensions: 22-3/4" x 17-1/4" x 12" 
Tank Dimensions: 12-3/4" x 10-1/2" x 5-3/4" 
Basket Dimensions: 7-1/4" x 8-1/4" x 4-1/4" 
Handle Length: 9-1/2" 
Power cord Length: 59" 
Tank Capacity: 12L (6L for each one) 
Lit Covers for preventing the boil oil splashing. 
Fryer Baskets with Plastic Handles for preventing scald. 
Residue Plates for filtering out the dregs. 
Hot Light indicates the temperature degrees turns back automatically. 
Removable Tank * Please kindly note the food showed in the pictures are for reference only, not including and please read the user's manual before using. Package Includes: 
1x Dual Tank Stainless Steel Deep Fryer 
2x Stainless Steel Baskets 
2x Stainless Steel Lid Covers 
2x Stainless Steel Residue Plates
feature_bullets: Heavy Duty Stainless Steel for Commercial Applications

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
